content: row bind off i ve used a standard bind off binding off on the wrong side to match the cast on edge knit 2 stitches then lift the first stitch on the right needle over the second stitch and off the needle then knit the next stitch then lift the previous stitch on the right needle over the just worked stitch and off the right needle continue binding off until one stitch remains finishing cut yarn leaving at least a 7 18 cm tail and pull through the last loop to secure it weave in ends and block to final measurements 3 cable chart lace chart key 4
